cards.name: Bulbasaur
cards.desc: Bulbasaur is a Grass/Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the "Seed Pokémon".

cards.name: Trainer' Mail
cards.desc: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Trainer card you find there (except for Trainers' Mail)  and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
cards.rule: You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack)
